name: quora_search
description: Search for questions and topics on Quora. Returns up to 15 results with question, answer preview, author, upvotes, and URL.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query (e.g. 'how does AI work', 'best programming language 2024')

steps.code: const results = []; const items = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="result"], [class*="Question"], [class*="pagedList"] > div'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(items.length, 15); i++) { const el = items[i]; const questionEl = el.querySelector('[class*="question_text"], [class*="Question"] a, a[href*="/"] span[class*="q-text"]'); const answerEl = el.querySelector('[class*="answer"], [class*="snippet"], p'); const authorEl = el.querySelector('[class*="user"], [class*="author"] a'); const upvotesEl = el.querySelector('[class*="upvote"], [class*="vote"]'); const linkEl = el.querySelector('a[href*="/"]'); results.push({ question: questionEl ? questionEl.textContent.trim() : '', answer_preview: answerEl ? answerEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 300) : '', author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : '', upvotes: upvotesEl ? upvotesEl.textContent.trim() : '', url: linkEl ? linkEl.href : '' }); } return { query: `{{query}}`, result_count: results.length, results: results }
steps.name: search_results
steps.label: Extract search results
